badRequestErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the authentication token in the API request is invalid

value.message: You are not authorized to perform this operation.

unauthorizedErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the authentication token in the API request is invalid

value.message: You are not authorized to perform this operation.

invalidOauthErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the OAuthToken is invalid or expired.

value.message: The OauthToken is invalid or has expired.

scopeMisMatchErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the OAuthToken does not contain the scope required to perform the operation.

value.message: The OAuthToken does not contain the scope required to perform this operation.

oauthOrgMisMatchErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the user chooses a different organization while generating the OAuthToken instead of the organization in which they want to perform the operation.

value.message: The OAuthToken is not valid for specified organization.

forbiddenErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the user does not have all the permissions required to access the resource.

value.message: You are not authorized to access this resource.

urlNotFoundErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the URL provided is invalid or does not exist.

value.message: The URL you requested could not be found.

methodNotAllowedErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the method in the API request is known by the server but disabled for the API requested.

value.message: This HTTP method is not allowed on this URL.

resourceSizeExceededErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the size of the resource exceeds the limit defined by the server.

value.message: Attachment size is too large. The maximum size supported is 20 MB.

unSupportedMediaTypeErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the server refuses the request as a result of receiving the input in an unsupported format.

value.message: The given content type is not supported. Please provide the input Content-Type as application/json

unprocessableEntityErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the input does not fulfil the conditions necessary for successfully executing the API.

value.message: The value passed for the 'from' query parameter is invalid.

missingEntityErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the input does not contain the mandatory parameters for successfully executing the API.

thresholdExceedErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the user sends too many requests within a given amount of time ("rate limiting").

value.message: The maximum number of API calls that can be made per day has been exceeded.

concurrentRateLimitExceededErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the user fires too many requests in a simultaneous/concurrent manner ("rate limiting").

value.message: The maximum number of Concurrent API Calls that can be made has been exceeded.

internalErrorResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the server encounters an unexpected condition that prevents it from fulfilling the request.

value.message: An internal server error occurred while performing this operation.

licenseErrorResponse.description:
This errorCode value appears if the user is unable to perform an action due to the limitations of the Zoho Desk edition in use
The possible values for the feature key are
    *AGENTS*
    *LIGHT_AGENTS*
    *TEAM*
The possible values for the editionType key are
    *FREE*
    *PROFESSIONAL*
    *ENTERPRISE*

value.message: Your Zoho Desk Edition does not support this feature/operation.

multipleUnprocessEntityResponse.description: This errorCode value appears if the input does not fulfil the conditions necessary for successfully executing the API.

invalidDataErrorResponse.description:
This errorCode value appears if there are inaccuracies, such as duplicate entries or invalid IDs, in the data given by the user. The type of inaccuracy is identified by the errorType param.
The possible values for the errorType key are:
*invalid* - the field contains an invalid value *duplicate* - the field contains a value that already exists *missing* - the field does not contain a value
The field that contains the inaccurate value is returned in the fieldName param, which is represented in the JSON Pointer convention

value.message: The data does not comply to the validation restrictions defined.
